sentence.Network_en: See, Sigil's also called the citys of Doors.
sentence.Network_cn: 看吧, 西吉尔也被称为门户之城.

sentence.Network_en: Maybe the fiend lords can't enter Sigil, but their agents, proxies, and sympathizers are there.
sentence.Network_cn: 也许恶魔领主们至今还无法进入印记城, 但是它们的密探 、 代理人和支持者们却云集于此.

sentence.Network_en: The Guvners think she created Sigil, while Ciphers wonder if it's all her dream.
sentence.Network_cn: 管理者认为是痛苦女士创建了印记城, 而密韵者则怀疑这一切都只是痛苦女士的梦境.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 印记城（Sigil）也被称作“万门之城（City of Doors）”。它坐落在外域的无极尖峰（the Spire）之上。
sightworthy 值得一看的sigil 图章sigmate S形的
标量变量的名称以美元符号开头，这个符号也称为魔符（sigil），然后是变量的Perl标识符：由一个字母或下划线开头，后接多个字母 …
12: 死亡骑士的远程物品栏放置魔印(Sigil)，类似于骑士骑士的圣契、小德的神像、萨满的图腾的东西。　　13: "英雄职业"只是一个赚人 …

list.abs: 印记之城总部(HQ in sigil):Shattered Temple,in the Lower Ward 影响位面(Plane of influence):The Astral Believers of the Source (a.k.a Godsmen) 核心.
Na : each of these magical sigils needs to be touched at the same time in order to open the path to the talisman .那些魔法印记必须被同时碰触，通往护符之路才会开启。

derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English: from late Latin sigillum 'sign'
